fun.connor.lighter

Interface Lighter.Builder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LighterUndertow.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    Lighter

    public static interface Lighter.Builder
    The generic Builder interface for Lighter objects. Contains methods which all Lighter builder's must have. These methods must be shared by all Lighter implementations as they will represent configuration options that can be requested by endpoints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addRouter

        Lighter.Builder addRouter(RouteConfiguration configuration)
        Add all the routes from the given route configuration object. This method can be called multiple times on a builder. This method is currently one of the few methods where runtime exceptions can occur during Lighter configuration. If the added RouteConfiguration instance contains routes that already exist, this method may throw a IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        configuration - The route configuration to add
        Returns:
        self

      • injectionFactory

        Lighter.Builder injectionFactory(InjectionObjectFactory factory)
        Add an injection factory representing the application's dependency injection solution. This method should only be called once.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to add
        Returns:
        self

      • adapterFactory

        Lighter.Builder adapterFactory(TypeAdapterFactory factory)
        Add a type adaptor factory for serialization and deserialization of data to Java objects. The factory added must be sufficient for all types and media types the application requires. This method should only be called once.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to add
        Returns:
        self

      • port

        Lighter.Builder port(int port)
        Set the port for the server to bind to.
        Parameters:
        port - the port
        Returns:
        self

      • hostName

        Lighter.Builder hostName(java.lang.String hostName)
        Set the host name for the server to bind to
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name
        Returns:
        self

      • showBanner

        Lighter.Builder showBanner(boolean show)
        Show the lighter startup banner. By default, the banner is shown.
        Parameters:
        show - true to show the banner, false to hide it
        Returns:
        self

      • addResponseTransformer

        Lighter.Builder addResponseTransformer(GlobalRequestTransformer transformer)
        Add a response transformer that will run for EVERY response generated by lighter. This method can be called multiple times to add multiple transformers. Transformers are not guaranteed to run in any order.
        Parameters:
        transformer - the transformer to be used on responses
        Returns:
        self

      • build

        Lighter build()
        Construct a Lighter instance using the configuration from this builder
        Returns:
        a new Lighter instance
